parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Corner relief type as defined by swCornerReliefType_e

title: ICornerReliefFeatureData.CollectAllCorners
description: Creates corners, all with the specified relief, in a selected sheet-metal body.
signature:
System.Int32 CollectAllCorners( 
   System.Int32
ReliefType
,
   out System.Object
Corners
)

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Corner relief type as defined by swCornerReliefType_e

returns: Error code as defined by swCornerReliefError_e
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ICornerReliefFeatureData::SetBodyScope
.
